This is another valve classic I enjoyed. Single player wise, it was really fun and challenging but never too hard. Playing Co-op with a friend through the co-op levels is so much fun also. Simple concept for a game, yet it is a complete blast and each new area keeps the levels fresh and exciting, always building off the previous chapter.

My favorite Valve game and sadly probably one of the last they will ever make. I think most of the people who made/wrote this have already left the company so we'll never get beautiful thing again. RIP Valve, Chell, and Gordon.
My favorite game ever!! I wouldn't expect for a new release, but at least more levels would be great in the future... But what can you expect from a Valve game.

VALVEç‰¹åƒ¹å¥—è£å…¥æ‰‹ï¼Œé€™ä¸€ä»£åŠ å…¥åˆä½œæ¨¡å¼ï¼Œç©¶ç«Ÿä½ çš„å¥½å‹å€‘æ˜¯ç¥çš„å°æ‰‹ï¼Œé‚„æ˜¯è±¬ä¸€æ¨£çš„éšŠå‹ï¼å‹æƒ…å¤§è€ƒé©—ï¼

Portal did a lot of thing right, and I mean a lot. But there were around 3 things that it could've done better with, and those are environment, length, and maybe co-op? I'm not sure, but dear god this game takes everything that Portal did right and does it better, and takes everything it did wrong and does it oh so right. The writing is absolutely wonderful in this game ("Warning: Neurotoxin levels at dangerously non-lethal levels.") and made me laugh out loud in many occasions. I loved the first game so much, and at the beginning of this game I was starting to worry that it wasn't as good as the first. I was very wrong. This game is even better than the first. Absolutely get this game.

portal there portal here blah blah portaling portal

Portal 1 and Portal 2 are both the best story-guided games I have ever played, infact - I would say they are the best games I have ever played full stop.  Everything from the way cutscenes are handled, where the player still has control, to the humour of the game, I love Portal!

I can't recommend this game more, and to think I got them both for Â£1.68 in the sale is awesome!   I would pay full price for both games in an instant, they offer compelling gameplay and the story is just too good, they are seriously some of the best games of all time.

Nothing to say. Great game!

I Love This Game,It Mixs Fun Puzziling Challenges With A Fun Story And Characters. From Glados And Her Sarcasticness, Cave Johnson And Him Being Always Over The Top, To Wheatley's Superiority Complex. It's A Fun Ride. It Has Some Slow Moments Like The Itch Chapter But Those Are minor Nitpics Compared To The Rest Of The Game. In Its Slow Moments It Makes Up With Its Amazing Moments Like Chapter 2,3, and 4. And Don't Even Get Me Started On The Soundtrack With Amazing Songs Like The Amazing "Want You Gone" If You're Looking For A Short But Sweet Puzzle Game, Portal Is The Game For You.

Sehr sehr gutes Spiel. Sehr gute Storyline, viele Plottiwsts und eine Super spiel Mechanik. Durchschnittliche Spielzeit von ungefÃ¤hr 6,5 Stunden. FÃ¼r den Preis (unter 3â‚¬) mehr als Empfehlenswert. Man kann sich sehr gut in die Story hinein versetzten und ist am Ende sogar sehr mitgenommen, durch die Starke bindung zu den Charakteren.

Portal 2  is a good game. You play as a robot and you need to solve different puzzles if you want to cross to the next level. Every level is harder and I can tell you this game is good. You can play it with a friend. The graphics are good and the mechanics are amazing. The game is not expensive and you will take some music for steam if you buy it (now really, you can just open YouTube if you want to listen to music). I think you will have fun in this game. Buy it =)

One of the best gaming experience money can buy, in my very humble and yet honest opinion.
